comments.body: Thank you for adding a new test coverage!
Please update `with no volume mounts` at line 150 correspondingly.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +164,168 @@    // Default memory limit is 1024M + 384M (minimum overhead constant).
    assert(executor.container.getImage === EXECUTOR_IMAGE)
    assert(executor.container.getVolumeMounts.size() == 1)
    assert(executor.container.getResources.getLimits.size() === 1)
    assert(amountAndFormat(executor.container.getResources

comments.body: Please update `The pod has no node selector, volumes.` at line 158 accordingly .

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +171,175 @@    // The pod has no node selector, and 1 volume.
    assert(executor.pod.getSpec.getNodeSelector.isEmpty)
    assert(executor.pod.getSpec.getVolumes.size() == 1)

    checkEnv(executor, baseConf, Map())
